item.title: Why does it stop downloading plz help
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Go around the house, and disconnect every phone line/router that isn’t attached to your computer. Nobody else using the wire = faster internets.

item.title: Why does it stop downloading plz help
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Google it.

Well, Dial up sucks, and everybody who has ever used anything faster can undoubtedly agree. I would try to find a program that downloads it in parts for a problem for that, I just let others with better internet download it, and torrent it for me (free downloads like Linix ISO’s) I have only had a problem like that when downloading a video for my school presentation(only needed 2 mins of the 3 hours ) and I finally did it at night when the network here is more freed and i can go to 130kb/s +.

Read full topic

item.title: Why does it stop downloading plz help
item.dc:creator: @v_a_l_e_r_i_y v a l e r i y
item.description:
@v_a_l_e_r_i_y wrote:

hahahaha, I can’t download porn =( my dad is like VERY good with comps and he knows like every way to see if someone is watching pics, vids anything…so its not that 4 sure…but maybe it IS because of dial-up, but its like small things that i can download ussually, like VERY small things and it gets to like 5% and stops and keeps doing that!!! ahhh!!! someone said its about ur download limit or something??? help HELP HELP

Read full topic

item.title: Why does it stop downloading plz help
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I would assume that your internet is very slow. Do you have dial-up?
Its probably your ISP, or your location.
either way, Its probably not YOUR fault, unless you’ve been downloading too much porn and your computer is all smothered up with viruses.

This is just my guess.
